product_name: Sawyer Blist-O-Ban Adhesive Bandages - Package of 4
long_description: Love your new hiking boots but hate breaking them in? Prevent blisters and hotspots before they form thanks to the innovative, flexible dome design of the Sawyer Blist-O-Ban Adhesive Bandages. Patented dome technology redirects pressure away from hot spots, preventing a blister from forming. Bandages are ultra-thin, breathable, water-resistant and latex-free. Blist-O-Ban Adhesive Bandages are a great solution for breaking in new boots or shoes. Package includes 4 bandages.
short_description: Love your new hiking boots but hate breaking them in? Prevent blisters and hotspots before they form thanks to the innovative, flexible dome design of the Sawyer Blist-O-Ban Adhesive Bandages.
